issues: Coordinate discrepancy: 4.61 km distance between asserted coordinates (45.850153, -121.989672) and geocoded location from geo_loc_name
Missing ecosystem and ecosystem_category fields that are present in other study samples
Soil type classification 'Xerosols' from coordinates does not align with expected Pacific Northwest forest soils
Collection temperature (10.1°C) is significantly lower than weather station data (15.5°C average) for same date
recommendations: Verify coordinate accuracy - consider using geocoded coordinates (45.8090043, -121.9823059) which align better with Wind River Experimental Forest
Add missing ecosystem='Environmental' and ecosystem_category='Terrestrial' fields for consistency with other study samples
Review soil classification - Xerosols are typically arid climate soils, inconsistent with Pacific Northwest evergreen forest environment
Cross-validate temperature measurements with local weather conditions and sampling methodology
Consider adding more specific location details within Wind River Experimental Forest for better spatial resolution
